page.title: 04EMPLOYMENT-LILLESHALL SURVEY
page.content: Much of our area is farmland,but because of modern methods{,fewer farm {workers}are employed.There are still {old established families}in the area but also{new estates}with new families.Very few{married women}work full-time but a considerable number work{part-time}mostly in{Newport}or {Telford}.Most work in an office;very few are nurses.The majority of{men}are in{full-time work}either in{Telford, {Newport or Wolverhampton}.Of the parents surveyed 50% were manually employed and 50% white collar workers.
